description:
Developed for sticky tent flies, delaminating backpacks and rain gear that's started to fail. Make them waterproof again with this liquid polyurethane coating.

  • Use on all synthetic outdoor fabrics: tent floors, rain flies, awnings, boat covers, backpacks or rain gear
  • Built-in foam brush for application
name: Gear Aid Seam Grip+TF Tent Fabric Sealant 118ml
